title: Into Etheria
description: Sorceress discovers a gateway to another world. She sends Prince Adam and Cringer in to investigate. They find the new world to be enslaved by Hordak and his second in command, Adora.

title: Beast Island
description: Adora locks He-Man up at Beast Island. As the Rebels try to break him out, Adora begins to question Hordak and all he stands for.

title: She-Ra Unchained
description: Hordak drains He-Man of his energy to power up his Magna beam in order to destroy the Whispering Woods, where the Rebels live. Adora finally understands the truth about Hordak and becomes She-Ra to stop him.

title: Reunions
description: He-Man and She-Ra rescue Glimmer's mother, Queen Angella, from the harpies. Convinced that Etheria is in good hands for a time, Adora decides to leave with Adam to visit their parents. Hordak follows.

title: Battle for Bright Moon
description: Hordak and Skeletor kidnap Adora. After she escapes, as She-Ra, she realizes that being back on Eternia is dangerous for her family. She returns to Etheria, with He-Man, just as the Rebels get ready to claim the kingdom of Bright Moon.

title: The Sea Hawk
description: Adora is brought aboard the pirate ship of The Sea Hawk, a man who follows his own way. After trading Adora in to Catra, Hawk begins to have a change of heart and tries to rescue her.

title: The Red Knight
description: When a mysterious red knight saves Adora, Bow, and Glimmer from the Horde, Bow begins to believe that he has competition.

title: The Missing Ax
description: When their father's ax is taken, his sons don't know how to tell him. They make up a lie that it got stole from them. As Bow sets out to find the "thief" he gets captured by the Horde.

title: The Prisoners of Beast Island
description: Catra kidnaps Sorrowful the Dragon, and takes him to Beast Island. She-Ra and the others must save him.

title: The Peril of Whispering Woods
description: The Whispering Woods have always protected the Rebels with it's magic. But now, Hordak has found a poison and uses it to destroy the woods.

title: The Laughing Dragon
description: Adora and Bow meet up with Sorrowful, a cowardly dragon. They try to help him find his courage when the Horde attacks.

title: King Miro's Journey
description: Adam takes his grandfather King Miro to Etheria to meet Adora. But the Rebels are undermanned and in trouble as Horde Inspector Darkney wants to erect a dome over the entire Whispering Woods.

title: Friendship
description: Lonnie, Adora's old friend from the Horde, is in trouble with Hordak and it's up to Adora to save her.

title: He Ain't Heavy
description: Hordak captures Prince Adam, on Eternia, using the Moon Mirror. He plans to use Adam as bait to capture Adora.

title: Return of the Sea Hawk
description: Catra kidnaps the Sea Elves of Seaworthy to bait a trap for Adora and Sea Hawk. Meanwhile, Adora is afraid Sea Hawk likes She-Ra better than her.

title: Duel at Devlan
description: Horde commander Dylamug is threatening the villagers of Devlan. Just one little girl, Kristala, is brave enough to seek out help from the Great Rebellion. But only She-Ra and Swift Wind are free to come back with her.

title: A Loss for Words
description: To stop She-Ra from speaking out in support of the Great Rebellion, Hordak and Shadow Weaver steal her voice.

title: Horde Prime Takes a Holiday
description: Horde Prime is taking a two-week vacation on the planet Tropica and leaves his flagship, 'the Velvet Glove' in Hordak's keeping. Although he has been ordered not to touch anything, Hordak plans to use the ship to conquer Etheria as well as Eternia. Catching wind of his plan, the Sorceress sends He-Man to Etheria to help She-Ra, but Skeletor is also on his way, wanting the ship for himself.

title: Enchanted Castle
description: The Rebels have gathered at Mystacore to celebrate She-Ra's defeat of the evil sorceress Mortella and the reinstating of it's rightful ruler, Castaspella. Adora recounts the entire story to Kowl.

title: Three Courageous Hearts
description: Shadow Weaver infiltrates the celebrations at Mystacore disguised as a young woman to cast a sleeping spell on all the rebels and sends She-Ra into the sixth dimension. Now only Kowl, Madame Raz and Broom are left to save her.

title: The Stone in the Sword
description: All seems lost as Hordak strikes with his new weapon, the Doom Balloon.

title: The Crystal Castle
description: Castle Bright Moon can be freed from a Horde takeover only if the king of the Trolls will reveal a secret to She-Ra.

title: The Crown of Knowledge
description: A young boy goes on a dangerous adventure in search of the Crown of Knowledge.

title: The Mines of Mondor
description: SheRa and the rebels go to the rescue of a captured prince and find they may be trapped in the Mines of Mondor forever.

title: Small Problems
description: Glimmer gets rather full of herself after rescuing Bow and Kowl. Then Catra tries a new shrinking formula on She-Ra, Swift Wind and Glimmer.

title: Book Burning
description: Freedom is threatened as Horde villains Tung and Rattlor begin to burn all the books.

title: Friends Are Where You Find Them
A Talent for Trouble
description: While assisting the Sorceress with her spring cleaning, Orko accidentally ends up on Etheria and is soon captured by the Evil Horde along with Madame Razz. He-Man joins She-Ra to help rescue them.

title: Gateway to Trouble
description: Skeletor plans to use a Gate-Maker to transport the entire Royal Palace to Etheria and get rid of it. But when Modulok defects to the Horde, old Bone-Face follows him to Etheria and makes an uncomfortable truce with She-Ra and He-Man.

title: Into the Dark Dimension
description: She-Ra and Hordak are pulled into a dark dimension thanks to Catra and Shadow Weaver's combined bumbling. There, the Dark One challenges them to find a way out. But to do so, the sworn enemies may have to work together.

title: Treasures of the First Ones
description: Mystic Isle will rise out of the sea for just one day, and Hordak plans to steal the ancient treasure of the First Ones hidden there. Light Hope calls on She-Ra for help and she in turn rounds up Sea Hawk and his crew.

title: Enemy with My Face
description: Shadow Weaver creates a Melog from a swamp and has it fight She-Ra, causing it to take on the powers and appearance of the Princess of Power.

title: The Rock People
description: The Horde and the Rebels investigate three mysterious meteors that have landed in the Valley of the Lost. The rocks turn out to be living beings from the planet Geolon who are looking for a new home as their own is about to be destroyed.

title: Birds of a Feather
description: Kowl's cousin Red Eye wants to join the Horde. With the help of a couple of Kowl's feather, he helps Shadow Weaver look spy into the Whispering Woods.

title: Just Like Me
description: When Modulok and his troops start to terrorize her village, a little girl called Leena seeks out her heroine She-Ra in order to join her fight against the Horde.

title: The Wizard
description: Feeling neglected, Kowl and Broom go off to see the Wizard of Silverglade. But on the way they meet Dr. Drome and Acrobad, who take them to the Horde outpost at Morestone where Col. Blast means to sell them to an alien circus.

title: Unexpected Ally
description: Many farmers are unable to pay Hordak's new taxes and are arrested by General Sunder. Mally escapes and seeks help from the Great Rebellion. Adora recalls Sunder being a man of his word but thinks he will be difficult opposition.

title: The Light of the Crystal
description: Catra and her troopers have taken over the kingdom of Elfworld and put all of it's subjects to work in the crystal mines. Prince Storm seeks help from the Great Rebellion, who have just been joined by the thrill seeking Arkion of Argon.

title: Loo-Kee Lends a Hand
description: Hordak has completed a time-freezing device that makes time stop in the Whispering Woods and freezes the rebels, including Adora. Light Hope enlists the help of magical hider Loo-Kee and sends him to Eternia to fetch He-Man.

title: Of Shadows and Skulls
description: Shadow Weaver is insulted by Hordak and seeks an alliance with Skeletor so she can rule Etheria herself. But of course Skeletor has no intention of keeping up his part of the bargain.

title: Jungle Fever
description: Adora is captured and taken to Beast Island. She escapes from prison, but hurts her head and loses her memory. She then encounters a primitive human tribe of Beast Warriors and has to face the Great Beast.

title: Black Snow
description: Black Snow has fallen on Galacia, land of the Selkies, who blame Frosta and seek war with the Snow Kingdom. Frosta and She-Ra set out to uncover the truth behind the bad weather.

title: Anchors Aloft: Part 1
description: Sea Hawk flies right into Admiral Scurvy's trap and goes down with his ship, having made sure Adora and his men are safely away. Hawk awakens on a mysterious island that harbors a very special treasure.

title: Anchors Aloft: Part 2
description: Admiral Scurvy has captured Adora and is taking her to the Fright Zone. Sea Hawk is reunited with his crew of sailors and asks Swen to restore the Falcon's old clipper to use as their new ship.

title: Darksmoke and Fire
description: Modulok has built a rocket specifically to disrupt the gateway between Etheria and Eternia that She-Ra and He-Man use. Adora ends up a thousand years in Eternia's past. There she meets Granamyr the dragon and his alley, Tarben.

title: Flowers for Hordak
description: Shadow Weaver uses the Black Ruby to darken the Whispering Woods. Hordak has Perfuma captured so she can't keep the flowers and trees alive. But while the Rebels struggle to save their surroundings, Hordak finds it difficult coping with Perfuma in the Fright Zone.

title: Wild Child
description: Something is wrong with the plants and vegetables of the Whispering Woods. Several of the Rebels and Woodsmen blame a pack of White Fangs led by a mysterious 'white ghost' that have been roaming the area.

title: The Greatest Magic
description: While visiting the Great Rebellion, Orko is summoned back to Trolla along with She-Ra. There Uncle Montork needs their help after the disappearance of the Crimson Council.

title: One to Count On
description: When Catra steals the Crystal Crown, Bow and Glimmer decide to get it back, certain that She-Ra will save them if they get into trouble. Adora follows them, but makes sure to teach them to take care of themselves.

title: Return of the General
description: The Evil Horde attacks Bright Moon and takes it's farm families prisoner. Having escaped capture, farmer Sunder takes up his armor once more to rescue his wife and daughter with a little help from She-Ra.

title: Out of the Cocoon
description: Villagers from the lowlands of Sand Valley ask the rebels for help after Baron Condor has taken all their food. She-Ra walks into Condor's trap, but finds help from a young cleaning girl known as Small One.

title: A Lesson in Love
description: The Rebels are all at the Twigget Carnival just outside Whispering Woods. Hordak needs a spy, so Shadow Weaver puts a spell on young Prince Kevin, who has run away from home.

title: Something Old, Something New
description: Sorcerers apprentice Ely takes the Serenity Stone from Shadow Weaver's Troopers and becomes very powerful and big-headed. He remains unaware that without the stone in it's proper place, Etheria will become unbalanced.

title: The Pearl
description: She-Ra and Mermista free a baby horned whale from Hordak's capture. They take it back to Mermista's father's undersea kingdom, Salinius. But they are unaware Hordak has attached a limped spy device to the baby whale.

title: Above It All
description: Shadow Weaver unleashes the power of the Cave of Winds on the Rebel leaders. She-Ra is hindered in her aid by tree-like beings who reside on a floating Sky Land.

title: Day of the Flowers
description: While Adora and Adam are celebrating the Day of the Flowers, Orko accidentally makes the swords of power disappear. Then Hordak sends the most powerful machines in the universe, the Monstroids, to attack Flower Mountain.

title: The Caregiver
description: Shakra, who took care of Adora during her years at the Fright Zone, leaves the Horde to join the Rebellion. But Hordak has given her a magic amulet which he uses to keep track of Shakra and the Rebels.

title: Romeo and Glimmer
description: Hordak plans to attack Bright Moon using Entrapta's new Trapper Tank. Meanwhile, Glimmer tends to captured Horde Corporal Romeo and the two form a bond. But Romeo still manages to escape and plans to tell Hordak about Bright Moon's weakened defenses.

title: The Perils of Peekablue
description: Hordak has his troopers capture Peekablue so Shadow Weaver can put a spell on her and force her to reveal the Rebels exact locations in the Whispering Woods. That way, the rebel leaders can be captured by The Horde's new Grabbers.

title: Sweet Bee's Home
description: Sweet Bee is looking for a new planet her hive of Bee people can settle on. But her ship Scout 3 is shot down over Etheria by Hordak. Luckily Adora and her visiting brother Adam are on hand to help out as She-Ra and He-Man. Also joining them are Mermista and Frosta, brandishing the powers of water and ice, respectively. Frosta immediately takes a liking to He-Man and becomes quite jealous when he appears more interested in Sweet Bee.

title: Portrait of Doom
description: Sprittina the Twigget thinks she doesn't have any skill to perform at the Summer Moon Festival. A mysterious woman gives her magic paint and tells Sprittina to paint pictures of all her Rebel friends. But each time she does, the subject of the painting mysteriously disappears...

title: Assault on the Hive
description: Skeletor attacks the spacecraft carrying Sweet Bee's hive in order to turn the bee-people into his slave army. She-Ra calls on He-Man for help. During the space battle, they meet new allies such as Crystal Sundancer and Comet Cat.

title: Loo-Kee's Sweety
description: Catra is capturing all the Conceals on Beast Island because they have been aiding the Horde's prisoners. Only Laa-See escapes to find Loo-Kee in the whispering woods. She-Ra and Swift Wind, who were enjoying a relaxing evening, decide to help free the Conceals.

title: The Time Transformer
description: Horde Professor Tempest has invented a Time Transformer capable of rewriting history. First he makes sure Hordak's Doom Balloon defeated She-Ra at Valleyview Castle, then Hordak insists on adding a meteor storm to the Eclipse beam attack on Bright Moon.

title: Brigis
description: The village of Brigis houses a great magic box and appears for one day every five hundred years. Hordak attempts to break the spell by kidnapping a little girl from the village.

title: When Whispering Woods Last Bloomed
description: To celebrate their anniversary, Netossa and Spinderella recount how they came to join the Great Rebellion. Hordak had tricked Spinderella into thinking the rebels had captured Netossa, so she used her spinning dance to move the trees of the Whispering Woods and pave a way in for the Evil Horde.

title: The Locket
description: Imp steals Adora's half of the magic locket she got from Sea Hawk. Sorrowful's friend Deena follows the rebels and gets captured by the Horde. Adora loses her sword and gets captured as well. Sea Hawk is alarmed by the other half of the locket, but walks in to a trap. Now it is up to Sorrowful, Bow, Madame Razz and Kowl to rescue them all.

title: Bow's Magical Gift
description: Bow gets a hold of Shadow Weaver's Wizard Wand and becomes quite overconfident about himself.

title: The Inspector
description: He-Man is called to Etheria after the rebels were tricked into an ambush and Adora has lost her sword. After capturing Horde Inspector Darkney, Adam takes his place and enters the Fright Zone with Adora as his assistant.

title: Shades of Orko
description: The Rebels thwart a Shadow Beasties attack thanks to Man-At-Arms' new electric force shields. Angry, Shadow Weaver steals Orko's shadow and takes it to Horror Hall, where it promptly escapes and runs free.
